body_html:
Sure, but you don't need to use a tf.while_loop(), which was suggested in the original issue.

I don't feel strongly either way adding such a function in image_ops.py... feel free to open a new issue with the proposed interface if you'd like!

I don't feel strongly either way adding such a function in image_ops.py... feel free to open a new issue with the proposed interface if you'd like!
body:
Sure, but you don't need to use a `tf.while_loop()`, which was suggested in the original issue.

I don't feel strongly either way adding such a function in `image_ops.py`... feel free to open a new issue with the proposed interface if you'd like!
